message.body: Is Citron Research Committing Securities Fraud? (post) http://www.smbtraining.com/blog/is-citron-research-committing-securities-fraud $TSLA $FB $VRX

links.title: Is Citron Research Committing Securities Fraud? - SMB Capital - Trading Education
links.description: The Citron Research website has been around for a number of years. It first came to my attention roughly five years ago when I was approached with an idea to make short trades based on their blog posts. That idea never panned out as the stocks they wrote about weren't very liquid, and therefore the risk/reward didn't make sense to me.

messages.body: What TD Ameritrade's IMX Tracker Can Do For Investors, And What It's Been Telling Us http://benzinga.com/z/8346599 $AAPL $AMZN $BABA  $NFLX $TSLA

links.title: What TD Ameritrade's IMX Tracker Can Do For Investors, And What It's Been Telling Us - Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL), Amazon.com, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMZN)
links.description: TD Ameritrade's Investor Movement Index (IMX) is one of the few indicators that measures investor sentiment. It's created by averaging TD Ameritrade Investor's positions, trading activity and other data. The IMX is updated every month and has been published since December 2012.

messages.body: $TSLA Funny how desperate they are....http://www.teslarati.com/bmw-330e-ad-campaign-mocks-wait-model-3/

links.title: BMW ad campaign mocks wait time for Tesla Model 3
links.description: Two new ads from BMW mock the waiting period that Tesla Model 3 reservation holders have to endure before their cars actually arrive. Without actually mentioning Tesla by name, the ads imply a person can either drive a new plug-in hybrid BMW 330e today or wait for the Model 3.
